effect.black_white: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.
effect.black_2_white_2: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.

short_effect.black_white: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.

flavor_text.black_white: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opponent’s team. The trap hurts opponents that switch into battle.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opponent’s team. The trap hurts opponents that switch into battle.
